subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Braves’ Mike Minor, a middling starter who entered the game with a 4.90 E.R.A., did not allow a base runner until the fifth inning. He did not allow a run until the eighth.
snippet: The Braves’ Mike Minor, a middling starter who entered the game with a 4.90 E.R.A., did not allow a base runner until the fifth inning. He did not allow a run until the eighth.
